Review.Titre: Loyalty is not Rewarded - Clunky unreliable Dashboard
Review.Contenu: There are a multipude of QR code onoine businesses. THis review just cautions that there are plenty to look at other than QR Tiger. From forst moments using, gives the imression of a business iperating from a teenagers bedroom. "Established Standard Procedures" were quoted at me when I dared ask for a promo for renewing mu annual subscriptipn (their Premium, highest cost offer mind you)I was also told that promos only exist for New Customers. Not in my case one year ago I might add but there you go. Loyalty isn't rewarded with this business and given how clunky, often offline and unreliable this QR code offering is, loyalty really should be rewarded.

Review.Titre: I wanted a simple serial group of QR…
Review.Contenu: I wanted a simple serial group of QR codes

QR codes work well but app store rerouting is slow to the point that it occasionally feels like you scanned a dead link. Had to send all scans to my website and redirect it on our end, cutting time from scan to redirect from 7 seconds using QRTiger to under 1 second on my website.

I’m so glad i discovered QRtiger from a friend. Ever since, it has given me the ability to accomplish my tasks efficiently and effectively. It has been such a life saver! As an entrepreneur, i look forward to using the services from QRtiger in the future since it has a really convenient way of integrating my campaigns with Google tag manager.
Very easy to use! Found the app through a friend and I am impressed how smoothly it runs and the options of making a qr code. Thabks QRtiger!

The quality of the product is high. The customer service is not world class, but it's good enough which is what matters. The organization of the website takes a bit to learn, but once you do it's worth it.The really standout feature of the service is just how much customization and data they allow you to extract from the QR codes including google analytics, location data, facebook pixel, device type, time,l multiple url QR's, etc. If you really want to take QR code technology to it's technical limit, then QR Tiger is the best choice for that. If you're looking for just a simple use case of QR code technology, I would reccomend something less intensive.

Review.Titre: QR Tiger is the best in QR platforms and assistance
Review.Contenu: QR Tiger is an all in one place for everything QR code related that you may need. They are helpful and the response is fast and solves the query. The continued updates on the platform is fantastic!

Review.Titre: I needed a quick question answered…
Review.Contenu: I needed a quick question answered about my renewal and was only able to correspond with QR Tiger staff via email.  I feel that the problem could have been solved quicker over the phone instead of going through 5 emails. But, they seem to only offer email outreach.  My corresponder was friendly and finally answered concern with a simple answer that I feel should have been given during my first outreach.

It's an excellent tool for creating dynamic vCards (I guess, for the other items, too). One improvement could be to be able to modify what's on your vCard. If you do not want to enter a private phone number, that position should not show up on the vCard as empty. Another option would be to enable entering different phone numbers than the options offered. In short, a bit more flexibility for creating the vCard would be five stars.

Review.Titre: Tames the unpredictability of QR code generation
Review.Contenu: QRtiger has become my go-to QR code generator due to its exceptional reliability. It may look a bit pricier than other small-time QR code generators but the value you get is just wow. Unlike other generators I've tried, it consistently produces scannable and error-free codes. The peace of mind that comes with knowing my codes will work flawlessly is priceless. QRtiger truly lives up to its name by taming the unpredictability that comes with QR code generation.

It is the best tool to keep me organized with school works. multi-tasking is already hard as a student who both handles studies and leadership tasks. I want my contacts to be organized from work, school, and family. Luckily, QRTIGER helps me to be able to do that. my contacts are now separated and I just scan a QR code and access my contacts. My contacts does not need to take up a lot of storage on my device, because its encrypted with my QR Code.

I wanted to try to use QRTiger for some features I offer in my work and the scannability on here versus others I have tried are better, faster also! I'm super surprised by it. I wished there was a way to have a trial or even a plan to access more of the features.

Review.Titre: Unleashing the Power of QR Codes with QR TIGER
Review.Contenu: As someone who has used QR TIGER, I can say that it is a fantastic QR code generator. The pricing is unbeatable compared to other similar services, and the advanced analytics that come with it are a significant plus. I also appreciate the fact that QR TIGER integrates with virtually any CRM and marketing tool via Zapier or Hubspot. The scannability of their QR codes is impressive, and I have never had any issues with them not scanning properly. While I do wish there were more templates for vCards and HTML5, and telephone support would be great, their email support is responsive. I would highly recommend QR TIGER to anyone looking for a reliable and efficient QR code generator.

Review.Titre: Great features & product platform. Had some initial glitches but it all worked out.
Review.Contenu: *** Update 6/29/30 *** Problem Resolved! Bumping up my review by one star. The customer service team circled back to me with help from their development team. As it turns out, the issue was ultimately on my end with my WiFi -- after isolating the issue and the QR codes worked fine on my mobile using cellular data. I am glad this all worked out and the printed collateral is not a total fail. Leaving my rating at 4-stars because of the amount of time/frustration and the multiple attempts required to get here. I suggest the QR-Tiger team please update their customer help FAQ and trouble-shooting scripts.~~original review ~~I want to love my purchase, but it’s been a disappointmentI want to love my purchase, because I spent a lot of time researching options. I chose QR Tiger because it had great features including good geolocation and de-duping of unique users. I am also the one making these recommendations, so I am also personally on the hook.However, I’ve had repeated QR code failures for no apparent reason. Customer Support was responsive within 24-hours — sent me screenshots to show it was working on their end, with a list of troubleshooting tips — but now no further response. QR code worked one day, then QR code didn’t work a few hours later. I checked on iPhone and Android mobile phones. And Mac desktop on two different browsers.Unfortunately, I’ve just sent a batch to print on card stock and may have thrown away a few hundred dollars there. We are a new business/brand and just launched on Saturday. So this was both an important issue and expensive in terms of money and opportunity missed (customer scans). Will give this another week or so but probably will switch to Beaconstac if things don’t get resolved.

Review.Titre: My issue was understood and resolved.
Totally Recommend QR Tiger for Ease of Use, Pro Look and Superior Customer Service.
Review.Contenu: I reviewed a lot of QR platforms and even tried some free ones. I found QR Tiger to be best for my use as I was scoping put my project. I loved the versatility of design and how I could incorporate brand logos and brand colours and also colour coordinate for various purposes. I started with the free version and quickly upgraded as I discovered more ways to use QR codes. I have not made use of the many features yet, but look forward to doing so as I launch my project. I had a question re renewing my account and found customer support super quick, super helpful and super friendly.
My questions were answered.  The service is good.  The product works great.
Great product which we have extensively used and will continue to do so.The support has been excellent with both customer services and developers.Thank you.
This is the most complete website if you want to create and manage QR codes.Every time I've had a problem, the support team has responded quickly and helped me a lot.

Review.Titre: I accidentally paid for a plan using…
Review.Contenu: I accidentally paid for a plan using the wrong account. I messaged them and Karl responded within minutes and was able to transfer the plan from one account to the other. He was very professional, responded back quickly, and executed as promised. I had a great experience and Karl deserves a raise.

Review.Titre: QR Tiger is better than free qrcodes.
Review.Contenu: QR Tiger is the best quality qr codes, best customizations, best choices to use qr codes like v-cards video CRM, and best prices. I chose to pay for qr codes rather than the free ones because I don't know if the free qrcodes will last forever. What if I print flyers and business cards with free qrcode, and it expires and I can't do anything about it???!!! I like the relyability of QR Tiger. I also like the customer support. It is email, but they are prompt at replying.

As a non-tech savvy individual, I was thrilled to discover the QR Tiger. This user-friendly QR code generator has made my life so much easier. Creating codes is a breeze, and the interface is intuitive, making it accessible to anyone. I love how I can customize the design and colors to match my brand. The QR Tiger is the best companion for new creators like me.

Review.Titre: Excellent! We've used QRTiger for a year now and…
Review.Contenu: We've used QRTiger for a year now (and just renewed at a really reasonable cost) and the experience has been great! It was easy to create a code directing customers to our website and another directing customers to our reviews url. Gustavo and team were more than FAST in responding to our questions and really good to work with.

Review.Titre: QR Tiger has a positive impact on my…
Review.Contenu: QR Tiger has a positive impact on my family’s business. To elaborate, we’re now living in a modernized society where payments and links are through qr codes. Because of QR Tiger, we are able to generate and customize codes easily, keep a watchlist, and a good tool that complements our business’ theme. I am very happy to have found and used QR Tiger.

I'm not super tech smart, but I find QR Tiger super easy to use. Their set up is pretty intuitive, and I can create all the codes I need easily and affordably. When my subscription was up, I didn't hesitate to renew.

Review.Titre: QR Tiger is the best on the market!
Review.Contenu: QR Tiger is the best on the market! It has advanced analytics with pricing that includes more dynamic QR codes. Their integrations via Zapier or Hubspot with practically every CRM and marketing tool. It made me perform things conveniently because their QR codes are more scannable on all devices compared to other generators which makes us do our tasks faster! The variety of use cases and QR code solutions that can be utilized across many organization departments.A free trial of their advanced and premium plans would be great for us to experience and decide whether to subscribe or not. I look forward for them to provide a telephone support although their email support is already responsive. I also wish there were more templates for HTML5 and vCards.

Honestly speaking Qrtiger really helps me a lot and makes my life more comfortable.  I am not really a techy person but the staffs are really helpful in providing all my queries, I don't have much idea about dynamic QR codes but then again the staffs are very much willing to help me all througout the process. Great Job!

Review.Titre: The best QR code software for marketing
Review.Contenu: I was out trying different QR code generators and I landed to QRTiger. They have a very good and friendly-user interface and with all the QR code solutions I need. So last month I availed their regular plan, and it was one of the best decisions I’ve made to make my purchase in QRTiger QR code software. Last week I upgraded to the premium plan for more benefits as I am using the QR codes for business and marketing. One of the best QR code generators out there with a very responsive customer support team! Kudos!

Review.Titre: It has the best customer support team
Review.Contenu: The customer support of QRTiger never fails to help me resolve my QR code needs. Their response time is very quick, and one time they even suggested ways I could use my QR codes to get more scans.When I was looking for a QR code generator, one factor that was important to me was reliable customer support. It is essential when it comes to solving my QR code issues and I find QRTiger's support team did a great job in handling my queries. They will never let you go with unresolved problems. QRTiger always do a great follow up on their customers.

Review.Titre: Customer Support goes above and beyond!
Review.Contenu: In my experience, QR TIGER has one of the best customer support among software companies. Very responsive to my queries. As a newbie to dynamic QR codes, I was always given proper resources and guidance. Jo in particular is willing to go above and beyond to help solve my issues. Great job!

Easy setup. UI works well. No issues, and we are moving along nicely with our QRs. QR Tiger is much more affordable than QR CODE GENERATOR, but we can't make sub accounts. Not a big deal since we don't really need that feature.
Great product! Good complex code design for security. Used my companies logo within the QR Code for ID. Easy to use, save and embed into documents.

I have been using QR TIGER for personal and academic purposes and it definitely made my life more efficient at a low cost. The best thing about QR TIGER is the accessibility and QRs can also be customized to be more visually appealing. It acts as a connector between the physical world and the web.
Dean and the QR-TIGER team did a exceptional job assisting me with my needs. I can say they went the extra mile to make sure I was well assisted. I recommend QR-TIGER for your qr code needs.

My QR codes have transformed from mundane to magnificent. The advanced customization options let me add logos, colors, and eye-catching designs to create codes that grab attention. Whether it's a business card or a promotional poster, QR TIGER ensures my codes are visually appealing and engaging. It's the ultimate tool for unleashing the creative power of QR codes.

Elaine Mae from QRTIGER's customer support team deserves a special mention for her outstanding assistance. Her depth of knowledge and willingness to go the extra mile in resolving our issues has been remarkable. Elaine's professionalism and friendliness made the support experience a pleasure, and we are grateful for her prompt and effective solutions.

Dynamic QR codes have become an invaluable tool for boosting sales in my business. By incorporating them into my product packaging, I've enabled customers to quickly access to additional information and make informed purchasing decisions. The QRTiger's user-friendly interface and analytics features have helped me optimize my campaigns, resulting in a noticeable increase in sales. It's a game-changer!

Integrating QR codes into my business processes was a breeze with QR Tiger. It seamlessly integrates with my website, email marketing, and social media platforms, allowing me to create a cohesive and engaging experience for my customers. The real-time analytics have helped me fine-tune my campaigns and achieve impressive results. QR Tiger is a game-changer!
So far so good. The ease of setting up a QR code was amazing. Excellent website with lots of clearly detailed guidance b
Easy to use. Plus I like how it keeps the vr card info so if they change a detail I don't have to re-input all the info again.
Amazing service. Very pleased!
Awesome product, very easy to use and practical for sharing my profiles.
It had fullfilled all expectations
PDF to QR code inbuilt HTML module are the key
Easy to navigate. Intuitive, Effective. Self explanatory and easy to apply. Simply amazing
